div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1009 Berezan' Island (anc. Leuke), off the Dnieper-Bug estuary, Ukraine, 1929-1930 Burial: 400-350 B.C.? Contents: 5 AE Olbia: aes grave (as AMNG I.1, pl. 8, 4) Disposition: museum material lost during war Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
